SECTION_CONTENT:
Occupational Release:
Keep unnecessary people away, isolate hazard area and deny entry. Consider evacuation of personnel located
downwind. Extinguish fire. Collect spilled material in appropriate container for disposal. Keep out of water supplies and
sewers. Releases should be reported, if required, to appropriate agencies.
